articles.author: Jem Bartholomew
articles.title: NHS England to offer life-changing drug to children with peanut allergy - The Guardian
articles.description: Up to 600 children this year and 2,000 next year will be among first in Europe to receive Palforzia treatment
articles.content: Children in the UK will be the first in Europe to receive a life-changing treatment for peanut allergies, after NHS England secured a deal for a drug that decreases the severity of symptoms including… [+2793 chars]

articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.title: This Crewed Mission to Mars Goes Through Europe - BNN
articles.description: ESA is a low-key space agency critical to humans returning to the moon, which 53 years after Apollo 11 will be a way station for the red planet.
articles.content: (Bloomberg) -- Some of NASAs greatest missions have been in collaboration with ESA. Now, the European Space Agency is getting more ambitious. Its an essential partner to Americas National Aeronautics… [+377 chars]
